Detailed Description

Base class for calculation This class contains general functional and abstract realization algorythm.

virtual double Alg::find ( int  mode,
double **  a,
double **  b,
double **  c 
) [pure virtual]

Find iteration parameter for one equation. Used to find ALFA.

Parameters:
modeNumber of equations, for which coefficient searched
aFirst data array for operator (to find ALFA -- z)
bSecond data array for operator (to find ALFA -- z)
cThird data array for operator (to find ALFA -- z)
Returns:
Iteration parameter (ALFA)

Implemented in AlgLin, and AlgNonlin.

double **  b,

) [pure virtual]

Find iteration parameter.As changed algorythm of ALFA calculation, its implementation is moved to find with parameter "mode".

bSecond data array for operator (to find TAU -- u)
